languages.text: "Астропатическая связь с колониями затруднена из-за козней еретиков. Культ Последнего восхода наносит удары повсюду, их спящие агенты проявились на всех планетах. На Веабос-6 был подавлен мятеж среди свежеприбывших заключенных, поддавшихся кощунственной пропаганде. Но другие миры стойко сдерживают удар врагов Человечества и не поддаются их тлетворному влиянию".

"The heretics' malicious acts make it difficult to maintain Astropathic contact with the colonies. The Cult of the Final Dawn strikes everywhere, and their sleeper agents are active on every planet. On Vheabos VI, a mutiny was crushed after a group of newly arrived prisoners succumbed to blasphemous propaganda. But other worlds stand firm against the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity and do not succumb to their pernicious influence."
languages.original_text: "Астропатическая связь с колониями затруднена из-за козней еретиков. Культ Последнего восхода наносит удары повсюду, их спящие агенты проявились на всех планетах. На Веабос-6 был подавлен мятеж среди свежеприбывших заключенных, поддавшихся кощунственной пропаганде. Но другие миры стойко сдерживают удар врагов Человечества и не поддаются их тлетворному влиянию".

traits.locale_text: "We have difficulty maintaining astropathic contact with the colonies due to malicious acts by heretics. Attacks by the Cult of the Final Dawn have been ubiquitous, and their sleeper agents have become active on every planet. On Vheabos-VI, a revolt had to be put down after a group of newly arrived convicts succumbed to blasphemous propaganda. However, other worlds are standing firm against the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity and do not yield to their corrupting influence."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "We have difficulty maintaining astropathic contact with the colonies due to malicious acts by heretics. languages.text: «La perfidia de los herejes bloquea el contacto astropático con las colonias. El Culto del Amanecer Final golpea por doquier, y tiene agentes infiltrados en todos los planetas. En Vheabos VI pudo sofocarse un motín después de que un grupo de prisioneros recién llegados sucumbiera a una propaganda blasfema. Pero otros mundos se han mantenido firmes contra la acometida de los enemigos de la Humanidad y no han sucumbido a su pernicioso influjo».
languages.original_text: "The heretics' malicious acts make it difficult to maintain Astropathic contact with the colonies. The Cult of the Final Dawn strikes everywhere, and their sleeper agents are active on every planet. On Vheabos VI, a mutiny was crushed after a group of newly arrived prisoners succumbed to blasphemous propaganda. But other worlds stand firm against the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity and do not succumb to their pernicious influence."

traits.locale_text: «La perfidia de los herejes bloquea el contacto astropático con las colonias. El Culto del Amanecer Final golpea por doquier, y tiene agentes infiltrados en todos los planetas. En Vheabos-VI pudo sofocarse un motín después de que un grupo de prisioneros recién llegados sucumbiera a una propaganda blasfema. Pero otros mundos se han mantenido firmes contra la acometida de los enemigos de la Humanidad y no han sucumbido a su pernicioso influjo».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “由于异端分子恶意干涉，我们很难通过星语唱诗班与殖民地保持联系。终末黎明邪教到处肆虐，每颗行星上都有他们潜伏的特工。维博斯六号星上，一群新来的囚犯听信了亵渎的宣传，发起了叛乱。不过，其他世界坚定地抵挡住了人类之敌的猛攻，没有屈服于他们的邪恶影响。”
languages.original_text: "The heretics' malicious acts make it difficult to maintain Astropathic contact with the colonies. The Cult of the Final Dawn strikes everywhere, and their sleeper agents are active on every planet. On Vheabos VI, a mutiny was crushed after a group of newly arrived prisoners succumbed to blasphemous propaganda. But other worlds stand firm against the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity and do not succumb to their pernicious influence."

traits.locale_text: “由于异端分子恶意干涉，我们很难通过星语唱诗班与殖民地保持联系。终末黎明邪教到处肆虐，每颗行星上都有他们潜伏的特工。维博斯六号星上，一群新来的囚犯听信了亵渎的宣传，发起了叛乱。不过，其他世界坚定地抵挡住了人类之敌的猛攻，没有屈服于他们的邪恶影响。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Nous avons du mal à maintenir les communications astropathiques avec les colonies à cause des actes sournois des hérétiques. Le Culte de l'Aube finale frappe partout et ses agents dormants sont actifs sur toutes les planètes. Sur Vhéabos-VI, une mutinerie a été étouffée après qu'un groupe de prisonniers fraîchement arrivés a succombé à une propagande blasphématoire, mais d'autres mondes tiennent bon face à l'assaut des ennemis de l'humanité et résistent à leur influence néfaste. »
languages.original_text: "The heretics' malicious acts make it difficult to maintain Astropathic contact with the colonies. The Cult of the Final Dawn strikes everywhere, and their sleeper agents are active on every planet. On Vheabos VI, a mutiny was crushed after a group of newly arrived prisoners succumbed to blasphemous propaganda. But other worlds stand firm against the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity and do not succumb to their pernicious influence."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons du mal à maintenir les communications astropathiques avec les colonies à cause des actes sournois des hérétiques. Le Culte de l'Aube finale frappe partout et ses agents dormants sont actifs sur toutes les planètes. Sur Vhéabos-VI, une mutinerie a été étouffée après qu'un groupe de prisonniers fraîchement arrivés a succombé à une propagande blasphématoire, mais d'autres mondes tiennent bon face à l'assaut des ennemis de l'humanité et résistent à leur influence néfaste. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「異端者たちの悪意ある行為により、コロニーと感応通信官のコンタクトを維持することが難しくなっています。最後の夜明け教団はいたるところで攻撃を仕掛け、潜伏工作員はどの惑星でも活動しています。ヴィアボス・VIでは、新しく到着した囚人たちが冒涜的なプロパガンダに屈したため、反乱が鎮圧されました。ですが、他の星は人類の敵の猛攻に立ち向かい、彼らの悪質な影響に屈することはありません」
languages.original_text: "The heretics' malicious acts make it difficult to maintain Astropathic contact with the colonies. The Cult of the Final Dawn strikes everywhere, and their sleeper agents are active on every planet. On Vheabos VI, a mutiny was crushed after a group of newly arrived prisoners succumbed to blasphemous propaganda. But other worlds stand firm against the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity and do not succumb to their pernicious influence."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者たちの悪意ある行為により、コロニーと感応通信官のコンタクトを維持することが難しくなっています。最後の夜明け教団はいたるところで攻撃を仕掛け、潜伏工作員はどの惑星でも活動しています。ヴィアボス・VIでは、新しく到着した囚人たちが冒涜的なプロパガンダに屈したため、反乱が鎮圧されました。ですが、他の星は人類の敵の猛攻に立ち向かい、彼らの悪質な影響に屈することはありません」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Die Schandtaten der Ketzer machen es schwer, astropathischen Kontakt mit den Kolonien beizubehalten. Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung schlägt überall zu, und ihre Schläferagenten sind auf allen Planeten aktiv. Auf Vheabos-VI wurde eine Meuterei niedergeschlagen, nachdem eine Gruppe neu eingetroffener Gefangener blasphemischer Propaganda erlegen war. Andere Welten dagegen wehren sich standhaft gegen den Ansturm der Feinde der Menschheit und geben ihrem heimtückischen Einfluss nicht nach."
languages.original_text: "The heretics' malicious acts make it difficult to maintain Astropathic contact with the colonies. The Cult of the Final Dawn strikes everywhere, and their sleeper agents are active on every planet. On Vheabos VI, a mutiny was crushed after a group of newly arrived prisoners succumbed to blasphemous propaganda. But other worlds stand firm against the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity and do not succumb to their pernicious influence."

traits.locale_text: "Die Schandtaten der Ketzer machen es schwer, astropathischen Kontakt mit den Kolonien beizubehalten. Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung schlägt überall zu, und ihre Schläferagenten sind auf allen Planeten aktiv. Auf Vheabos-VI wurde eine Meuterei niedergeschlagen, nachdem eine Gruppe neu eingetroffener Gefangener blasphemischer Propaganda erlegen war. Andere Welten dagegen wehren sich standhaft gegen den Ansturm der Feinde der Menschheit und geben ihrem heimtückischen Einfluss nicht nach.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Kâfirlerin habis eylemleri, kolonilerle Astropat iletişimini sürdürmeyi zorlaştırıyor. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı, her yere saldırıyor; gizli ajanları, her gezegende kol geziyor. Vheabos VI'da yeni mahkûmların günahkâr propaganda sonucu çıkardığı isyan bastırıldı. Diğer dünyalar ise İnsanlığın düşmanlarının katliamına karşı direniyor, onların tehlikeli etkilerine boyun eğmiyor."
languages.original_text: "The heretics' malicious acts make it difficult to maintain Astropathic contact with the colonies. The Cult of the Final Dawn strikes everywhere, and their sleeper agents are active on every planet. On Vheabos VI, a mutiny was crushed after a group of newly arrived prisoners succumbed to blasphemous propaganda. But other worlds stand firm against the onslaught of the enemies of Humanity and do not succumb to their pernicious influence."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlerin habis eylemleri, kolonilerle Astropat iletişimi sürdürmeyi zorlaştırıyor. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı her yere saldırıyor ve gizli ajanları her gezegende kol geziyor. Vheabos VI'da yeni gelen bir grup mahkûm günahkâr propagandaların gazına gelince çıkan bir isyan bastırıldı. Diğer dünyalar ise İnsanlığın Düşmanlarının katliamına karşı dimdik duruyor ve tehlikeli etkilerine boyun eğmiyor."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
